articles.title: Home of the week: Waterfront living at an over-55 community in Canton for $895K
articles.description:
This two-bedroom condo has direct pond access and is neighbors with Wampatuck Country Club.

The post Home of the week: Waterfront living at an over-55 community in Canton for $895K appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore a two-bedroom condo in Canton priced at $895K for over-55 residents.
Enjoy direct pond access and proximity to Wampatuck Country Club.
This community offers a desirable living option for Boston's aging population.
